item.title: Loan Marketing Segmentation
item.description: Shiny app GitHub repo R Markdown report with code/visualizations Using publicly available data from crowd-sourced lending platform Lending Club, I set out to create a classifier which would help solve a marketing problem which (I imagine) a company like this would encounter. I realized that one of the most popular loan types Lending Club provided, debt conslidation, was rather different than the rest from a marketing perspective. An advertisement for a debt consolidation product would likely relate to the stress caused by having too many sources of debt, and then offer to help them simplify that situation.
